feed.title: BigBlueButton Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.3
entry.content:
In this iteration we have patched a whiteboard issue (introduced in BBB 3.0.2) causing excessive logging in the browser console (repeated logging of a single error) which also led to higher rate of logs for nginx.

What's Changed

  • fix(html5): Memoize whiteboard custom UI overrides config by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22715

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.2...v3.0.3

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.3.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.

Client build: 1147

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.4
entry.content:
In this iteration we have included various fixes to the client. A newer version of bbb-sfu-recorder improves the screenshare portion of recordings. Recording processing (specifically video format) has been sped up.

Below is a list of the pull requests in this iteration, grouped by component.

Link to installation command / instructions/ schedule / planned features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/3.0/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

new * feat(html5): add control over default setting of breakout recordings by @nacosdev in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22696 * feat: introduce offerRecordingForBreakouts parameter by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22783 * feat(html5): Adds translations for Tldraw by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22461

fixes * refactor: remove unused config customHeartbeat by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22701 * fix: client warnings by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22693 * Fix(html5): Whiteboard tools auto hide by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22728 * fix: Raise hand notification not well aligned on 75% font-size by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22721 * Fix(html5): First item not being focused in user list dropdown by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22722 * Fix(html5): controls on fullscreen screenshare by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22737 * Fix(html5): Zoom reset not working on preseter's change by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22738 * fix(html5): Prevent the whole audio modal from re-rendering by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22473 * fix: client crash in breakout room mgmt panel by @lfzawacki in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22761 * Fix(html5): Connection status bars not showing colors on dark mode by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22743 * fix: restore unsupported browser check by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22685 * fix (html5): Fix whiteboard crash on Safari versions <= 16 by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22764 * Fix: whiteboard crash on second user join by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22757 * fix(html5): Whiteboard crash when trying to use the rectangle shortcut by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22767 * fix(html5): Extra padding on whiteboard toolbar when cursor is outside + auto hide enabled by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22760 * update minBrowserVersions to include safari 14 + 15 by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22769 * fix(html5): Fix ephemeral webcam settings by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22758 * Refactor(html5): Disable assets tool on whiteboard by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22777 * fix(chat): Resize input + fix scroll odd behavior by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22692

test * test: Set same CI font-family to avoid unexpected failures + update snapshots by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22726 * test: Ignore folders prefixed pr- by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22736 * ci: Skip publish action on merge event by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22749 * test(fix): Update user talking indicator check to use regex for exact match by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22750 * ci(fix): Correct formatted run script by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22759 * test: [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22774

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22700 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22709 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22789 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language eu by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22727 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language zh_TW by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22772 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language it_IT by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22779

chore * build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 4 directories with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22669

recording

  • Speed up compositing of video in recording processing by @kepstin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22703

packaging and configuration changes

  • build(bbb-webrtc-recorder): v0.8.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22768

docs

  • docs: Clarify conflict resolution in pluginManifests by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22747

New Contributors

  • @nacosdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22696

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.3...v3.0.4

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.4.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.

Client build: 1170

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.5
entry.content:
In this iteration we have included various fixes to the client and to exporting presentation with annotations.

Below is a list of the pull requests in this iteration, grouped by component.

Link to installation command / instructions/ schedule / planned features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/3.0/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * Fix(html5): Users being moved to room zero on running meetings causes a crash by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22802 * fix: error acquiring wake lock by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22800 * fix: prevent undefined functions in external video component by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22809 * fix: crash due to MediaDevices EventTarget unavailability by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22821 * fix: undo and redo buttons do not fade away by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22716 * Refactor(html5): Make logs by level by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22778 * fix: adjust allowDefaultLogoutUrl param behavior by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22820 * fix: enable support to older chrome version by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22824 * refactor: browser support improvements by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22831 * fix(html5): Prevent undefined rect by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22797 * fix (html5): Limit html5 to generate one single bundle (no more chunks) to make it work in Safari 15 by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22817 * fix(html5): Add missing subscription data for current user by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22832 * Fix(html5): Dark mode flicker on presentation snapshot by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22805 * Fix(html5): Whiteboard dark mode buttons by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22791 * fix: adjust webpack config to only use safari bundle in production by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22788 * breakouts: randomly assign users to rooms in an evenly distributed manner by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22848 * Fix(html5): Client error log related to missing name of user bby @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22811

test * test(shared-notes): Fix steps and assertions on Pin and unpin notes onto whiteboard by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22744 * tests(whiteboard): Update all whiteboard tests [+refactor; +fixes] by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22498 * test: Add session details modal (join parameter) test by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22822 * test(refactor): Use dynamic count assertion by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22771 * refactor(tests/npm scripts): Add npm scripts without CI=true by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22795

plugins * fix(plugin/html5): fix ui-command changeEnforcedLayout for plugins by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22751

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22801 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22846 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22799 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22828 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22838

chore * chore(html5): [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22818 * chore(html5): Add logs for breakout management by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22840

recording

  • fix(recording): Fix recording processing hang introduced by #22703 by @kepstin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22815

export-annotations

  • build(deps): bump perfect-freehand from 1.0.16 to 1.2.2 in /bbb-export-annotations by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22517
  • build(deps): bump form-data from 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 in /bbb-export-annotations by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22532
  • build(deps): bump svgdom from 0.1.17 to 0.1.20 in /bbb-export-annotations by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22543
  • build(deps): bump @svgdotjs/svg.js from 3.2.0 to 3.2.4 in /bbb-export-annotations by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22521
  • build(deps): bump redis from 4.0.3 to 4.7.0 in /bbb-export-annotations by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22540
  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): @svgdotjs/svg.js not respecting provided image dimensions by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22807
  • SMALL FIX : Remove duplicate jobId in logger by @thifranc in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22642
  • chore(annotations): [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22812
  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): Fix incorrect import statement by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22860

Core

  • chore(middleware): Update go.sum by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22816
  • chore(gql-actions): [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22785
  • build(deps): bump github.com/redis/go-redis/v9 from 9.7.0 to 9.7.3 in /bbb-graphql-middleware in the go_modules group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22748

recording

  • recording: Recheck whether video can be decoded after remux by @kepstin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22823

packaging and configuration changes

  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.17.0-beta.7 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22803
  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.17.0-beta.8 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22826
  • fix(freeswitch): add basic dialplan instructions to reject anonymous UAs by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22847
  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.17.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22841
  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.17.1 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22843

docs

  • fix(doc): fix broken link in presentationConversionCacheEnabled by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22694
  • docs: Create migrationtonewserver.md by @sripathroy in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22723
  • remove: Clean up after user feedback form removal by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22813
  • docs: add more info on dial-in anonymity by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22861

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.4...v3.0.5

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.5.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.

Client build: 1192

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.6
entry.content:
In this iteration we have included various fixes to the client and to exporting presentation with annotations. Quick poll now optionally includes a preview step. Raise hand was added to disabledFeatures supported list.

Below is a list of the pull requests in this iteration, grouped by component.

Link to installation command / instructions/ schedule / planned features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/3.0/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

new * feat(quick-poll): Autofill poll creation form by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22305

fixes * Fix(html5): Presenters height not propagating for another user when fit to width is enabled by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22835 * Fx(html5): External video no seeking when sliding the progress bar by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22849 * Fix(html5): viewer being able to select tool via shortcuts by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22870 * fix(html5): Prevent users from changing external video native volume using arrow keys by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22830 * Fix(html5): Version being incorrectly placed in CSS by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22874 * fix (html5): Modify the messageToMarkdown function to support uppercase links by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22675 * style: adjust raise hand toast with many users by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22790 * fix(client): log info about multiple users being returned from current user subscription and filter results by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22899 * fix(html5): syncing issue receiving annotations too quickly by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22901 * Fix(html5): Whiteboard assets tool appearing on main bar for viewers by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22928 * html5: Add stream ids to webcam video tags by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22934 * fix(html5): Unmute microphone message is cut off on mobile by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22834 * fix: The pencil tool should look like a pencil while using it by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22944 * fix: Emojis can't be reverted by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22948 * fix (html5): avoid cannot read prop of null for isLocalStream param by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22958 * fix(html5): Clean up states of the voice activity hooks upon disconnection by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22947 * fix(whiteboard): remove un-synced local annotations on reconnection by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22945 * Fix(html5): Fix player unsync on webm files by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22851 * fix(html5): Chat auto scrolling glitch by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22953 * fix(html5): Chat scroll not sticking to bottom by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22965 * fix(html5|external-video): Unable to play on mobile by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22968

test * feat(ci): New step in CI to publish in digital oceanic spaces (mockup) by @antonbsa in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22924 * refactor (tests): Add explicit flags to identify local and current user streams by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22921

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language it_IT by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22863 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22963 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ru by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22878 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language uk_UA by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22914 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22929 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language zh_TW by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22912 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22959 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ko_KR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22917 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22937 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22957 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22940 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22976 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language el_GR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22960

chore * build(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 3 directories with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22853 * build(deps): bump html-to-image from 1.11.11 to 1.11.13 in /bigbluebutton-html5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22566 * chore(client): bump tldraw to 2.0.0-alpha.29 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22882 * build(deps): bump estree-util-value-to-estree from 3.2.1 to 3.3.3 in /docs in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22884

export-annotations

  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): Preserve whitespaces in text shapes by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22873
  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): Fix rendering of sticky notes by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22869

Core

  • feat: Support to disable raise hand feature via disabledFeatures by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22865
  • fix(bbb-web): Enforce maximum SVG dimensions after rasterization by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22794
  • chore (gql-middleware): Log the reason why middleware disconnected the browser by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22862
  • fix(API): Use meeting to get ID for insertDocument by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22881
  • refactor(API): Add more logs during presentation conversion by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22900
  • fix(API): Add error handling to document conversion threads by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22969

recording

  • fix(recording): split audio render command for each segment by @germanocaumo in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22756

docs

  • docs: Rename apply-conf.sh to apply-config.sh by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22933
  • docs: Recommend writing recording changes to etc bigbluebutton by @antobinary in #22971

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.5...v3.0.6

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.6.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.

Client build: 1227

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.7
entry.content:
The main focus of this iteration are improvements to the breakout rooms, external video (youtube) share and presentation conversion. LiveKit support has been improved and some whiteboard edge cases have been handled. For those who had previously set up the LiveKit integration, we recommend reviewing the installation steps as there may be actions needed regarding recording and network configurations.

Note: Some BigBlueButton plugins now support other languages. If you are seeing things like "pickRandomUserPlugin.actionsButtonDropdown.label.pickUser" instead of the label, check for a newer tag/version of the plugin on github. We welcome translation contributions to the plugins as we are propagating the translation support.

Below is a list of the pull requests in this iteration, grouped by component.

Link to installation command / instructions/ schedule / planned features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/3.0/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

new * feat(livekit): selective audio subscription, initial audio groups implementation, leave audio, floor mgmt, + by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22247

fixes * fix: External youtube video is not syncing by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22972 * Fix(html5): Whiteboard autohide not working for opened menus by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22867 * fix: Add clear annotations action to presentation menu options by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22804 * ref (html5): Restore the button Delete to whiteboard (instead of Clear all annotations) by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22702 * Fix(html5): Whiteboard crash when clipboard permission is denied by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22985 * fix(whiteboard): Lock selected tool to prevent automatic switching to select mode by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22624 * fix(html5): fix actions-bar extensible area breaking when plugin used old SDK by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22996 * fix(html5/whiteboard): Reset selection state after editing frame name by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22994 * fix(html5/chat): Save unsent messages on session storage by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23003 * fix(html5/external-video): Make the player respect timestamp from URL by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23017 * fix(html5): Add timeout to redirect on meeting end by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23002 * fix: Screenshare fullscreen button sometimes requires two clicks by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23054 * fix: Fix locale problem when having multiple plugins by Core

  • fix(core): increase max authToken size to 50 chars in user table by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23013
  • refactor (bbb-web): Allow getJoinUrl parameters for non-moderators by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22943
  • refactor(bbb-web): Add more logging to presentation conversion process by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23105
  • perf (gql-server): Improve breakout room query efficiency via table pre-population (breakoutRoom_user) by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23116
  • fix (akka-apps): Breakout rooms not inheriting disabledFeatures from the parent meeting by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22850
  • chore: Bump tomcatEmbed to 9.0.104 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23119
  • fix (bbb-web): Check if meeting exists before download/upload presentation cache by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23122
  • fix (gql-server): Showing invitation forever when user joined in a different room instead of the assigned one by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23120
  • chore (gql-middleware): Log the reason why middleware disconnected the browser by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22862
  • chore: Add log to show what breakouts were meant to be like by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22005
  • feat: Add persistent captions view to postgres by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23099
  • refactor(bbb-web): Modify conversion message handling concurrency by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23129
  • refactor (html5): Decreases significantly the number of subscriptions querying BreakoutRooms by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23137

recording

  • recording: check for videos with no decodable frames by @kepstin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23010

New Contributors

  • @pinhaum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/23092

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.6...v3.0.7

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.7.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.

Client build: 1256
